Room.Name: Highland Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Highland Avenue, running parallel to the city walls.
Room.LongDescription: Highland Avenue forms the eastern end of the City of Oceancrest. On the east side of the road is the massive City Wall which protects the citizens of the city from any unwarranted attacks against them. On the west side of the road is the elegant Crimson Dragon Traveler's Lodge.
